status.description: Whether the account is active or inactive.

type.description: The type of the account, where true = business and false = residential.

primaryLocationId.description: The ID of the primary location associated with the account.

primaryContactId.description: The ID of the primary contact associated with the account.

domain.description: The domain name associated with the account.

tax.description: Information related to taxes for the account.

exempt.description: Whether the account is exempt from taxes.

id.description: The tax ID for the account.

regionId.description: The ID of the tax region associated with the account.

locationId.description: The ID of the location associated with the contact.

first.description: The first name of the contact.

last.description: The last name of the contact.

phone.description: The phone number of the contact.

accountId.description: The unique identifier of the customer account associated with the location

status.description: The status of the location (active or inactive)

address.description: The address information for the location

address1.description: The first line of the address

address2.description: The second line of the address

state.description: The state or province of the address

zip.description: The ZIP or postal code of the address

phone.description: The phone number for the location

resourceId.description: The unique identifier for the user who created the note.

accountId.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the note.

associatedId.description: The unique identifier for the contact or ticket associated with the note.

status.description: The status of the note. True for closed and false for open.

attachmentIds.description: The unique identifiers for the attachments associated with the note.
